text: When are these idiots going to put parking spaces up next to the building? Some old people don't walk well but didn't bring a driver. It's sad to see them suffer.

I stopped in tonight looking to slowly browse at roughly closing time. Sam, the owner, assured me that he would be happy to wait as long as I needed and thanked me for choosing his store and we shook hands. We had a laugh or two while I looked over the wide variety of products that I might need in a pinch. 

It has been a long time since I felt a desire to support a local business. I mean like get out and spread the word / take a loss to support. I surely could find what I need down the road at Walmart... But I would rather spend my money at Sam's Convenient Food Mart. Lottery, booze, snacks / drinks, fried chicken... this is the place!
This bakery is amazing! The special smell hits you as you first open the door. Heather is a wonderful baker. Everything we've tried has been delicious. Don't miss the coconut bars. Yum!
